title: Hour 2 - Tua and His Doctors, Tom Pelissero
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Tua and His Doctors, Tom Pelissero
description:
Dan revisits the circumstances surrounding Miami Dolphins QB Tua Tagovailoa's recent head injury and exactly why the doctor who cleared him to play last Sunday lost his job. And NFL insider Tom Pelissero drops by with more pertinent information on the current state of the investigation into how Tua was handled during both games in which he suffered injuries.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
